text: Ara tara yakhana dhukala yebhabe tadera pita tadera adesa karechilena, takhana allahâ€Œra birud'dhe tadera kichu'i karara samarthya chila na, kintu eti iyakubera antarera ekati basana ya tini caritartha karechilena. Ara nihsandeha tini abasya'i chilena jnanera adhikari yehetu amara tamke jnanadana karechilama, kintu adhikansa loke'i jane na.
